item.title: 高市早苗正式当选首相，将加速推进预算审议
item.description: 高市早苗于周三在选举中取得压倒性胜利后，正式连任日本首相。这一程序性安排使她能够将注意力转向加快预算审议进程，并落实与美国总统特朗普达成的贸易协议。【原文：Sanae Takaichi was formally reelected as Japan’s Prime Minister on Wednesday following her resounding electoral win, a formality that allows her to turn her attention to expediting budget deliberations and implementing a trade deal agreed with US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 阿尔法世代助力中国陷入困境的商场重振旗鼓
item.description:
面对电商冲击的购物中心正日益将目光投向儿童群体，希望吸引家长们一同前来消费。

【原文：

Shopping centers grappling with the shift to e-commerce increasingly focus on kids, hoping their parents will tag along.

】

item.title: 百达翡丽顶级表款引领二手市场升值浪潮
item.description: 由贵金属打造的百达翡丽顶级腕表正推动二手腕表市场持续复苏。【原文：Ultra-high-end Patek Philippe timepieces made from precious metals are driving a sustained recovery in the used watch market.】

item.title: 诺沃控股与ACS联合支持2.2亿欧元量化投资基金
item.description: 量子投资公司Quantonation Ventures为其第二支专注于物理基础技术的基金筹集了2.2亿欧元（约合2.6亿美元），该基金获得数据中心建设商ACS SA、诺和诺德控股股东等机构的支持。【原文：Quantum investment firm Quantonation Ventures has raised €220 million ($260 million) for its second fund devoted to physics-based technologies, backed by data center builder ACS SA and Novo Nordisk A/S’s controlling shareholder, among others.】

item.title: 黑人高收入者在南非最高收入阶层中所占比例扩大
item.description: 一项新研究发现，在南非民主统治的三十年间，黑人南非人的收入水平不断提高，这极大地改变了该国中高收入群体的种族构成。【原文：Rising remuneration among Black South Africans has dramatically changed the racial makeup of the country’s band of middle- and top-income earners over the course of three decades of democratic rule, a new study has found.】

item.title: 新西兰将货币政策会议次数增至每年八次
item.description: 新西兰央行将从2027年起将货币政策会议次数增至每年八次，此举旨在提高透明度和问责制。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank will increase the number of monetary policy meetings it holds to eight a year from 2027, in a move aimed at improving transparency and accountability.】

item.title: 改变心意，推动轮换
item.description:
多数资金管理人如今担忧企业正在过度投资。

【原文：

Most money managers are now worried that companies are overinvesting.

】

item.title: 德克萨斯首席执行官淡化人工智能担忧，公司股价因回购计划大涨
item.description: 德克思集团首席执行官罗斯·杜维内特驳斥了人工智能技术将损害房地产需求的担忧，称高端写字楼市场依然强劲。【原文：Dexus Chief Executive Officer Ross Du Vernet doused concerns that artificial technology will hurt real estate demand, saying the market for premium office space remains strong.】

item.title: 贝恩资本与瑞银集团向澳大利亚Quadrant旗下Aidacare公司提供3.82亿美元贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，贝恩资本信贷有限合伙公司与瑞银集团正向澳大利亚医疗设备制造商艾达凯有限公司提供总额达5.4亿澳元（约合3.82亿美元）的贷款。此举再次印证了私募信贷被用于资助利益相关者回报的趋势。【原文：Bain Capital Credit LP and UBS Group AG are lending a combined A$540 million ($382 million) to an Australian health-equipment manufacturer Aidacare Pty., according to people familiar with the matter, in the latest example of private credit being used to help finance stakeholder returns.】

item.title: 软银、东芝等企业对美日天然气项目感兴趣
item.description: 日本经济产业大臣赤泽凉生周三向记者表示，包括软银集团、东芝公司和日立公司在内的日本企业已表示有意参与美国总统特朗普宣布的天然气项目。【原文：Japanese companies including SoftBank Group, Toshiba Corp. and Hitachi Ltd. have expressed interest in participating in a US gas project announced by President Donald Trump, trade minister Ryosei Akazawa told reporters on Wednesday.】

item.title: YouTube故障影响34万用户，其他网站也出现中断
item.description: 据网络监测平台Downdetector称，YouTube近34万用户遭遇服务中断，该流媒体网站同时报告其推荐系统出现故障。【原文：YouTube was down for nearly 340,000 users, internet monitor Downdetector said, while the streaming site reported an issue with its recommendations system.】

item.title: 菲律宾将拍卖自4月以来首批巨额比索债券
item.description: 菲律宾将于周三首次发行大额债券，这是自4月以来的首次。政府正加大支出力度以刺激经济增长。【原文：The Philippines will sell large-sized bonds on Wednesday for the first time since April, as the government ramps up spending to spur economic growth.】

item.title: Bulls Warming Up to India Small Caps as Earnings Improve
item.description: 小型企业去年12月季度的盈利增长了29%。【原文：Smaller firms posted a 29% jump in December-quarter earnings.】

item.title: 日本会计团体寻求放宽保险公司债券损失规则
item.description: 一家日本会计团体正寻求放宽人寿保险公司对政府债券账面亏损的核算规则。【原文：A Japanese accounting group is seeking to ease rules on how life insurers book paper losses on government bonds.】

item.title: 新西兰维持基准利率不变，政策将保持宽松
item.description: 新西兰央行将利率维持在三年半以来的最低水平，并预计在经济重拾增长动能期间将维持该利率水平一段时间。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank held interest rates at the lowest level in 3-1/2 years and expects them to remain there for a period while the economy regathers momentum.】

item.title: 据称Starboard敦促Riot加快向数据中心转型
item.description: 据彭博新闻社查阅的一封信函显示，激进投资者Starboard Value正敦促Riot Platforms公司加快转型步伐，从比特币矿商转型为能够承接超大规模租户的数据中心企业。【原文：Activist investor Starboard Value is asking Riot Platforms Inc. to speed up its transition from Bitcoin miner to a data center company that could house hyperscaler tenants, according to a letter reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 澳大利亚高薪资增长加剧澳联储通胀挑战
item.description: 澳大利亚上季度年度工资增长率仍居高位，凸显劳动力市场持续紧张，并强化了本月加息后储备银行面临的通胀挑战。【原文：Australia’s annual wage growth remained elevated last quarter, highlighting ongoing labor market tightness and reinforcing the inflation challenge facing the Reserve Bank after this month’s interest-rate hike.】

item.title: 埃利奥特增持挪威邮轮股份，指控凯蒂·佩里演唱会超支
item.description: 激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司已持有挪威邮轮控股有限公司逾10%的股份，其表示担忧管理层问题及包括凯蒂·佩里演唱会在内的活动支出。【原文：Activist investor Elliott Investment Management has built a stake of more than 10% in Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd., citing concerns about management and spending on events including a Katy Perry concert.】

item.title: 亿万富翁保尔森出售阿拉斯加矿业公司Trilogy Metals的股权
item.description: 亿万富翁对冲基金经理约翰·保尔森已出售其在Trilogy Metals Inc.的持股。此前十余年间，他一直是这家专注阿拉斯加矿业公司的投资者，而该公司近期刚获得美国政府支持。【原文：Billionaire hedge-fund manager John Paulson has sold his stake in Trilogy Metals Inc. after more than a decade as an investor in the Alaska-focused mining company, which recently secured US government backing.】

item.title: "捕食者"间谍软件被用于入侵安哥拉记者的iPhone
item.description: 安哥拉一名知名记者遭到政府级间谍软件的攻击，这是该南部非洲国家已知首例此类事件，研究人员发现。【原文：A prominent journalist in Angola was targeted by a government-grade spyware in the first known case of its kind in the southern African nation, researchers have found.】

item.title: 改革英国党誓言执政后将整顿英格兰银行和预算责任办公室
item.description: 英国改革党新任财政发言人罗伯特·詹里克将于周三宣布，该党若在下次大选中执政，将对英格兰银行及政府预算监督机构进行全面改革。【原文：Reform UK plans to overhaul the Bank of England and the government’s budget watchdog if it wins power at the next general election, its newly minted Treasury spokesman, Robert Jenrick, will say on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本出口创三年来最大增幅，中国出口激增
item.description: 日本出口增速创下三年多来新高，主要得益于对华芯片出口和对欧盟汽车出口的激增。【原文：Japan’s exports rose at the fastest clip in more than three years as shipments of chips to China and autos to the EU surged.】

item.title: 曼达尼威胁将提高纽约市房产税作为最后手段
item.description: 纽约市长佐兰·马姆达尼发出最后通牒，威胁将房产税提高近10%，以此向州长凯西·霍楚施压，要求增加财政拨款。【原文：New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani has thrown down an ultimatum, threatening to raise property taxes by nearly 10% as a way to lobby Governor Kathy Hochul for more funding.】

item.title: 加拿大央行勒令支付公司XTM停业，数百万资金下落不明
item.description: 加拿大银行发布命令，要求金融科技公司XTM Inc.暂时停止处理零售支付业务，指控其未能保障客户资金安全并造成"重大资金短缺"。【原文：The Bank of Canada issued an order to temporarily stop financial technology company XTM Inc. from handling retail payments, alleging it failed to safeguard client funds and caused a “significant shortfall.”】

item.title: 英伟达出售Arm股权，这家企业曾是其收购目标
item.description: 英伟达公司已出售其持有的Arm控股公司全部股份。五年前，该公司曾试图收购这家芯片技术公司但未果。【原文：Nvidia Corp. sold off the last of its stake in Arm Holdings Plc, a chip technology company that it tried and failed to acquire five years ago.】

item.title: 农历新年期间交投清淡，金价在连续两日下跌后企稳
item.description: 黄金价格在连续两日下跌后基本持平，因许多亚洲市场因农历新年假期休市。【原文：Gold was little changed after a two-day decline, with many Asian markets offline for the Lunar New Year holiday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织敦促日本避免通过降低消费税加剧财政风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，日本应避免削减消费税，以免加剧财政风险。此前，首相高市早苗正准备加快关于暂停对食品征收销售税的讨论进程。【原文：Japan should refrain from cutting the consumption tax to avoid fanning fiscal risks, the International Monetary Fund said, as Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi prepares to speed up debate on a potential suspension of the sales tax on food.】

item.title: 油价跌势暂歇，因美伊核谈判显现进展
item.description: 在美伊就该欧佩克成员国的核计划举行积极会谈后，油价延续跌势，原油风险溢价随之回落。【原文：Oil held a decline after positive talks between the US and Iran over the OPEC member’s nuclear program, paring crude’s risk premium.】

item.title: 日本债券市场一隅因外国需求而活跃起来
item.description: 一款沉寂多年的日本债券期货合约正逐渐成为海外投资者的热门对冲和建仓工具，这些投资者正大幅增加对日本超长期债券的配置。【原文：A Japanese bond futures contract that lay dormant for years is emerging as a popular hedging and positioning tool for overseas investors who are ramping up exposure to Japan’s super-long bonds.】

item.title: 圣塔斯公司年度利润下滑后将裁员10%
item.description: 桑托斯有限公司计划裁员10%，此前这家澳大利亚第二大天然气生产商因油气价格下跌而利润大幅下滑。【原文：Santos Ltd. is targeting a 10% headcount reduction after Australia’s second-biggest natural gas producer reported a slump in profit on lower oil and gas prices.】
